（……一通りトレーニングをしてみたが、\nやっぱりネックになってるのは障害物競走:
(...I did some training, but...
The obstacle course really is the bottleneck...)
また派手になぎ倒しちゃったわね、ノエルちゃん……: Looks like Noel knocked them down again...
ぐぅううう……どうしても我慢できなくなっちゃう……\nイライラしちゃって気づいた:
Ughhh... I can't take it anymore...
I'm so irritated that I start kicking myself when I realize it...
壊れないようにクッションを置いたりして正解ね。\nノエル、あんまり気に病まないで:
It's a good idea to place cushions so they don't break.
Noel, don't worry about it too much.
とはいえ、困ったな……色々と作戦は試したが、\nノエルのクセはどうしても抜けない:
That said, this is a problem... I've tried a lot of strategies, but...
I just can't get rid of Noel's habit.
そうよね……一回コーンがあたしに飛んできたし。\n頭に当たって痛かったわ……:
That's right... Corn came flying at me once.
It hit me in the head...
で、でも成長はしてるわ！ だって、最初に比べたら、\nずっと我慢できる時間が伸び:
B-But she's grown! I mean, compared to the first time,
I'll be able to endure it forever!
ああ、確かにそうだな。とはいえ、他の競技に比べると、\n明らかにノエルにかかって:
Yeah, that's true. That said, compared to other competitions,
It's obvious that Noel's under a lot of stress.
じゃあ、一度他の競技……リレーの練習しましょ！\nほら、ジュリーちゃんも。:
Okay, let's practice for the other competitions... The relay race!
Come on, Julie.
ラウラの言葉に、一度三人はリレーの練習に切り替える。\nその姿を眺めながら、俺は:
At Laura's words, the three of them switched to practicing for the relay race.
As I gaze at her, I wonder if she has any brilliant ideas.
（採点対象となる競技は結局、５種目しかない。\nもっと種目があれば捨てるのも戦術:
(In the end, there are only five events that qualify for grading.
Throwing it away would be part of the tactic if there were more events, but...)
（他の種目で出来る限りをやった以上は、\nこの種目を勝てるようにするのが一番確実:
(I've done everything I can for other events, so...)
It's the most certain way to win this event, after all.)
ねえ、%usernameusernameuserna%。\n何か良い案は思いつい:
Hey, %usernameusernameuserna%.
Did you come up with any good ideas?
倒していい障害物を決めるとかか？: Like deciding on an obstacle you can defeat?
ノエルに目を閉じてもらうとか……: Like having Noel close her eyes...
そうだな。今のところ思いつくのは……: That's right. All I can think of right now is...
失点を覚悟で障害物を壊していいとするの？\n……狙えるなら苦労しないし、そこまで:
Are you prepared to lose points and destroy obstacles?
...If I can aim, I won't have any trouble, and it's not that overwhelmingly fast.
……障害物競走を目を閉じて、全部乗り越えるのって、\n癖を我慢するよりも難しくな:
...Close your eyes on the obstacle course and get over it all...
Isn't it harder than holding back your habit?
結局のところ、ノエルがストレスを感じるのが問題な気はするわ。\nだから、イライラ:
At the end of the day, I feel like Noel's stress is the problem.
So why don't you come up with a way to get rid of your irritation?
それが一番現実的か……\nノエルが我慢できるように快適なサポートするってことだな:
So that's the most realistic option...
That means I'll be providing comfortable support so Noel can endure it.
ええ、そういうこと。\nとりあえずはこれを用意したわ。:
Yes, that's right.
For now, I've prepared this.
ええ。取り出すまでに、冷たく冷やしておいたのよ。\n直接は関係ないけどストレスも:
Yes. I chilled it cold before I took it out.
It's not directly related, but it also reduces stress.
なるほどな。確かにそれもありだ。: I see. That's certainly part of it.
ふう、疲れたっ。ちょっと休憩ね。: Phew, I'm tired. Let's take a break.
みんな、お疲れ様。\n冷やしたタオルとスポーツドリンクよ。:
Good work, everyone.
It's a cold towel and a sports drink.
特訓は順調だ。他の４種目の練度は確実に上がっている。\nよし、多少スパルタにする:
The special training was going well. The level of training for the other four events had definitely improved.
Alright, let's do a little spartan!
玉入れ１００回連続で成功するまで終わらないぞ！\nさあ、集中を高めていけ！:
I won't finish until I succeed a hundred times in a row!
Come on, focus!
%usernameusernameuserna%って１００回連続とか好きだよね。:
%usernameusernameuserna% likes doing it a hundred times in a row.
If I remember correctly, I said something like that to Me-chan, too.
フラットスピンの特訓よね。\nやってのける、めるちゃんもすごいけど……:
Flatspin training, right?
Mechan's amazing too, but...
（100は無理としても、10連続成功は普通に出来るな。\n集中力もかなり持続でき:
(Even if a hundred is impossible, ten consecutive successes are normal.)
My concentration is starting to last quite a while.)
よーし、そこまで！ 一旦、休憩にするか。: Alright, that's enough! Let's take a break.
……いや、もうイエッサーはいいんだが。: ...No, I don't need a yesser anymore.
そうだ！ みんな、よかったらクッキー焼いてきたから食べてね。\n甘いものを食べて:
That's right! Everyone, I baked some cookies if you'd like, so eat them.
I thought eating sweets would cheer you up, so I brought it.
やったー！ 食べる、食べる！: Yay! I'll eat it, I'm gonna eat it!
どうしたの、心香ちゃん。ぼーっとしちゃって。: What's wrong, Kokoro? You're spacing out.
……なんだか、%usernameusernameuserna%が来る前の、\nバ:
...For some reason, before %usernameusernameuserna% came...
I thought it was a lie that my days were all over the place.
いろんなことがうまくいくと、自然と雰囲気も良くなるんだなって。: When a lot of things go well, the atmosphere naturally gets better.
そうだね。あの頃より今の方がすっごく笑顔が増えて、\n楽しいわよね！:
That's right. There's a lot more smiles now than back then,
It's fun, right?
ええ、だからちょっと感慨深くなっちゃって……\nごめんなさい、私らしくないわよね:
Yes, that's why I'm feeling a little emotional...
I'm sorry, it's not like me.
そんなことはないわ。\nそういう風に思えることが私は嬉しいの。:
That's not true.
I'm happy that you feel that way.
そうだよねー！ やっぱり仲良く出来るってのは、\nとってもいいことだよね！:
That's right! Being able to get along really is...
It's a very good thing!
そうだな。チームワークはどのチームでも重要だからな。\n人見知りしないってのも重:
That's right. Teamwork is important for any team.
It's important not to be shy.
う、ううん！ なんでもないわ！\nそれよりも、クッキーをもっと食べていいからね！:
N-No! It's nothing!
More importantly, you can eat more cookies!
えっ、いいの？ んん！ 美味しい～！: Huh? Are you sure? Mmm! It's delicious!
大丈夫よ、たくさん作ってきたから！\nさ、みんなもっと食べましょう！:
Don't worry, I made a lot!
Come on, everyone, let's eat more!
……さて、障害物競走以外に関しては完璧だと言える。\nなので、残りの時間は障害物:
...Now then, you could say she's perfect when it comes to anything other than obstacle races.
As such, the remaining time should be spent in the obstacle course.
（かなり意識してるな……ただでさえ我慢をして、\nストレスがかかってるのにプレッ:
(She's pretty conscious of it... She's already holding back,
She's under a lot of stress, but she's also feeling pressure...)
じゃあ行くわね、ノエル！\nよーい、スタート！:
Then let's go, Noel!
All right, start!
くうっ……がまん、がまん、がまんっ……！: Ugh... Hold back, hold back, hang in there...!
最初の障害は耐えたわ……！\nがんばって、ノエルちゃん！:
I endured the first obstacle...!
Good luck, Noel!
なんとか耐えて、等間隔に設置されたハードルを越えていく。\nといってもギリギリま:
I somehow managed to endure it and crossed the evenly spaced hurdles.
That said, I'm conflicted until the very last moment, so the hurdle is on my feet.
（まあ、あれは我慢をしているだけだ。\nだから大丈夫……スラローム走でコーンを倒:
(Well, I'm just holding back.
So it's okay... As long as I don't defeat the corn in the slalom run...)
そうして、こまごました動きに焦れたのか、\nコーンに触れた足でそのまま蹴り飛ばし:
And so, perhaps because she was impatient with her flustered movements,
I kicked her with my leg, which had touched the corn, and mowed her down.
でも少し変化はあったわよね！: But there was a slight change!
例え歩みが遅くても前に進んでいると思わせてくれる走りだ。\nしかし、そんなノエル:
It's a run that makes me feel like I'm moving forward, even if my pace is slow.
However, Noel's expression doesn't show.
結局その日は、それ以上の改善はなく、\nそしてノエルの表情も晴れることのないまま:
In the end, there was no further improvement that day
And then Noel's expression didn't clear up as we disbanded.
よーっし！ 今日もみんな頑張っていこうね！: All right! Let's all do our best today!
昨日うまくいかなったこと、気にしてるのかな……: I wonder if she's worried about how things went yesterday...
帰り際も、ずっと暗い顔をしていたしな。: She was always looking gloomy on the way home, too.
じゃあ、あたしが探してくる！: Then I'll go look for her!
いや、俺が探してくる。\nみんなはトレーニングを始めておいてくれ。:
No, I'll go look for her.
Everyone, please start training.
うん……分かったわ、ノエルちゃんをお願いね。: Yeah... Got it. Take care of Noel, okay?
（……おそらく、\nずっと上手くいかない事が負担になってるんだろう。）:
(...Most likely,
It's probably a burden that things haven't been going well for a long time.)
（雰囲気が良い今だからこそ、\n自分が重荷になっている……そんな現状だからな）:
(Now that the atmosphere is good,
I'm becoming a burden... That's just how things are.)
ノエル！！ 探したぞ。: Noel!! I've been looking for you.
サボリか？ そういう悪い奴には腕立て１００回が待ってるぞ。\nもちろん返事は？:
Are you skipping? A hundred push-ups await bad guys like that.
Of course. What's your answer?
よし、いい返事だ。仕方ないから９９回にまけといてやろう。: Alright, that's a good answer. There's no helping it, so I'll leave it at 99.
俺のくだらない冗談に、その瞬間は笑顔を見せてくれたものの、\nすぐに目を伏せるノ:
In that moment, she showed me a smile at my stupid joke, but...
Noel immediately lowers her eyes.
やっぱり無理なんだよ。\n私が普通のみんなに馴染もうとするなんて。:
I can't do it after all.
I can't believe I'm trying to fit in with everyone else.
だって、我慢できないんだもん。\n壊したいのに我慢し続けて……嫌な気持ちでいっぱ:
After all, I can't hold back.
I want to destroy it, but I keep holding it in... and it fills me with unpleasant feelings.
そのせいで、暴れて迷惑をかけて……\nだから、もう私なんてダメなんだよ。:
Because of that, I went on a rampage and caused trouble...
That's why I'm no good anymore.
皆の迷惑になって、きっと見捨てられちゃうんだ。\nだから……もう、私はこのチーム:
I'll be a bother to everyone, and I'm sure they'll abandon me.
That's why... I should leave this team...
だって、みんなに一杯迷惑をかけたんだよ？\nそれで逃げ出しちゃった私のこと、呆れ:
I mean, I caused a lot of trouble for everyone, you know?
She's exasperated at me for running away because of that...
聞かなくたって分かるよ……\nこんなにみんなの時間も無駄にして……:
You don't have to ask...
I wasted so much of everyone's time...
まあ、付いてきてくれ。すぐにわかるさ。: Come with me. You'll see soon enough.
ここからなら、ちょうど見えない位置だからな。\nこれで、こっそり見られるだろう？:
I can't see it from here, after all.
Now you'll be able to sneak a peek, right?
視界に入らないように上を向きながら走るっていうのは？: What about running while looking up so you can't see?
それは目を閉じて走るのと大差ないんじゃない？: Isn't that not much different from running with your eyes closed?
普段は抑えられてるんでしょう？\nじゃあ競技と意識しないようにしたらどうかしら。:
You're usually restrained, aren't you?
Then why don't you try not to think of it as a competition?
そうね。方向性としてはアリだとは思うわ。\nでも、具体的にどうやるべきかよね。:
That's right. I think it's a good direction.
But I don't know exactly how to do it.
あっ、いっそのこと大回りにしたらどう？\n障害物が気にならないようにすればいいの:
Oh, why don't we just make a big detour?
You just have to make sure the obstacles don't bother you!
ノエルが思っているよりもずっと、\nあいつらはノエルのことが好きなんだよ。:
Much more than Noel had expected
They like you, Noel.
４人揃ってのチームだからだ。: It's because we're a team of four.
ノエルが仲間だからだ。: It's because Noel is one of us.
私……迷惑かけてばかりで……今日なんて練習にも来なくて……\nなのに、どうして…:
I... caused so much trouble... I didn't come to practice today...
So why...?
個性があって、その個性に苦しみながらも努力してる。\n近くで見てるあいつらがノエ:
She's got her own personality, and she's doing her best even as she suffers from that personality.
There's no way those guys watching from up close wouldn't notice Noel's hard work.
ただパイロットになるだけならノエルを切り捨ててもいい。\nだが、そういう話じゃな:
If I'm just going to be a pilot, I can cut Noel off.
But that's not what we're talking about. As comrades, I want to win.
皆、ノエルと一緒に勝ちたいんだよ。\n俺も含めて……な。:
Everyone wants to win with Noel.
Including me... yeah.
ごめん……明日まで、待ってもらえないかな？: Sorry... Could you wait until tomorrow?
ノエルはそれっきり何も言わずに走り去ってしまった。\nその背中を見送りながら、俺:
Noel ran off without saying anything after that.
Watching her go, I emerge from the shadows.
というか、何でそんなところから……: Actually, why are you coming from there...?
お話、できたのよね……？: You were able to talk, right...?
ああ。ちゃんと伝えるべきことは伝わったはずだ。\n今日は休みにしたが、もう大丈夫:
Yeah. I should have been able to tell her what I needed to tell you.
I took the day off, but I believe I'm fine now.
